description:
This is the Ultimate How To Self-Publish Like A Pro Course. It includes four distinct courses, each designed to help you publish and launch your book for maximum impact.

In this Ultimate How To Self-Publish Like A Pro Course you will follow the instructor step-by-step through the self-publishing process from start to finish. You'll also learn how to create a Kindle ebook and how to connect your Kindle ebook to your physical book on Amazon.

In addition to this you'll receive my Author's Platform Building course that will show you how to build an author's platform to launch your book and you'll receive a bonus module that will give you a strategy for launching your book to increase you chances of landing on a bestsellers list.

Finally you'll receive my two other social media mini courses. How to reach more people on Facebook organically with my Facebook organic reach course. And learn to grow a powerful Twitter platform and increase your influence online with my powerful Twitter Impact Strategy course.

This whole course is broken down into approximately 30 modules between 5 to 15 minutes in length each and is packed rich with practical content to get your book published and to turn you into an influential author.

If you've ever dreamed of being a published author, this course is absolutely for you.
title: The Ultimate How To Self-Publish Like A Pro Course
